intension: Create a series of posters for a futuristic fashion show set in 2080. Each poster must feature clothing designs that integrate technology, like LED-lit fabrics or solar-powered accessories. Use a neon color palette and add augmented reality elements where viewers can see the clothes in motion via a mobile app.
globalcaption: The image features a woman wearing a white, futuristic outfit with a headpiece and a necklace. She is standing in front of a pink background, which complements her outfit. The woman appears to be the main focus of the image, and her attire suggests a connection to the year 2080.
keywords: fashion, style, clothes, clothing, outfit, wear, apparel, futuristic, technology, led, light, neon, glow, bright, solar, power, woman, mobile, screen, augmented reality, electronic, innovation, tb, instagram, insta, ig, post

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a black background with a pink circle in the center. The circle is surrounded by a white border, making it stand out against the dark background. The pink circle appears to be the main focus of the image, with the black background providing a stark contrast

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a woman wearing a futuristic outfit, including a headpiece with a visor. She is standing in front of a white background, which highlights her unique attire. The woman is also wearing a necklace, adding to the overall style of her outfit. The scene appears to be a close-up of the woman, focusing on her outfit and the visor
